titles.title: Atrocity Accountability Act
Atrocity Accountability Act
To require the Secretary of Defense to review security assistance provided to certain countries identified as being at risk for the commission of atrocities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Atrocity Accountability Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense to review risks related to its provision of security assistance to certain countries identified as being at high or medium risk for atrocities.
